title: # 311 - Finesse Mitchell & ME
description:
I sit down with comedian Finesse Mitchell to talk about his new special premiering on showtime October 19th at 10pm! We also talk about hip hop, his football career, Florida fraternities, The Rock, standup, and much more!

Follow Finesse on twitter/instagram @FinesseMitchell

Watch his special "The Spirit Told Me To Tell You" on Showtime Friday October 19th at 10pm or Stream it on the Showtime app!


We added 2nd shows on select dates for my “Body Shots” world tour. Use promo code “Shots” for pre sale tickets at www.bertbertbert.com

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
To Follow me on..
Twitter: https://twitter.com/bertkreischer
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer/?hl=en
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Akreischer
